body:
$! There are different contact details for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) depending on your enquiry. $!

^ Check the [driving section](/browse/driving "Driving section") first to see if your question is answered there. ^

##Theory tests

You can use the following ways to contact the DSA about theory tests.

$C 

**DSA theory test bookings and enquiries**

<customercare@pearson.com>  
**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English bookings), 0300 200 1188 (English enquiries) 0300 200 1133 (Welsh bookings)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
**Fax:** 0300 200 1177  
Monday to Friday 8am to 4pm

$C 

$A

DSA
PO BOX 381
M50 3UW 

$A

##Practical tests

You can use the following information or the [use the online service](https://forms.direct.gov.uk/forms/form/273/en "Contact the DSA"){:rel="external"} to contact the DSA about practical tests.

$C

**DSA practical test bookings and enquiries**

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1144  
**Fax:** 0300 200 1155  
Monday to Friday 8am to 4pm

$C

$A

DSA
PO Box 280
Newcastle-Upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP 

$A

##General enquiries

You can use the following information to contact the DSA with a general enquiry.

$C

**DSA customer service centre**

<customer.services@dsa.gsi.gov.uk>  
**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1144  
**Fax:** 0300 200 1155  
Monday to Friday 8am to 4pm

$C

$A

DSA
PO Box 280
Newcastle-Upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP 

$A

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
overview: Contact the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) - email, phone, letter, driving test, practical driving test
title: Contact the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)
